title: Why Emma Chamberlain Quit YouTube
description: This week we talk about why one of the biggest creators on YouTube is leaving. We also make a suggestion to YouTube on how they could actually support creator sustainability on the platform.
itunes:author: Colin and Samir
itunes:subtitle: This week we talk about why one of the biggest creators on YouTube is leaving. We also make a suggestion to YouTube on how they could actually support creator sustainability on the platform.
